pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṃghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.4: na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.6: na jānanti kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.7: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.8: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṃghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.9: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṃghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.12: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṃghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.18: Tāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.19: ‘ahaṃ, ayye, itthannāmā paripuṇṇadvādasavassā bhikkhunī saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.22: Sā bhikkhunī saṃghena paricchinditabbā— ‘byattāyaṃ bhikkhunī lajjinī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.23: Sace bālā ca hoti alajjinī ca, na dātabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.24: Sace bālā hoti lajjinī, na dātabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.25: Sace byattā hoti alajjinī, na dātabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.26: Sace byattā ca hoti lajjinī ca, dātabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.30: Ayaṃ itthannāmā paripuṇṇadvādasavassā bhikkhunī saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.31: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.34: Ayaṃ itthannāmā paripuṇṇadvādasavassā bhikkhunī saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.35: Saṃgho itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiṃ deti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.36: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.38: Dinnā saṃghena itthannāmāya paripuṇṇadvādasavassāya bhikkhuniyā vuṭṭhāpanasammuti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.39: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.40: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.41: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:1.42: “Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassā saṃghena asammatā vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.8: ñattidutiyena kammena vuṭṭhāpanasammuti na dinnā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.11: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:2.15: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
